titles.title: He Is All We Need (Hallelujah, I have found Him)

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Sisters) It’s so good to love the brothers, (Brothers) It’s so good to love the sisters, It’s so good to be in Jesus for He knows our every need. So we’re sure He’s very near us, We are sure He always hears us, We are satisfied in Jesus, He is all we need.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord Jesus there’s no friend like you for us. We are gladly giving You our trust. When we wake up in the morning, when we lie down in the evening, You are all that we are seeing, You are all we need.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
